segments.text: Not only does it centralise management , it also increases the efficiency of funds . We have testimonials from various companies who are very happy with the service .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I'm sure you do . It sounds like an excellent service .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You see , nowadays , a lot of companies are concerned about their group account management . As long as your company meets all the requirements of our Group Account Deposit Service , I would fully recommend it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Here are some leaflets detailing everything we've discussed .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Could you also let me view some of the testimonials ? I'd really be interested to see what other group companies thought of this service .
segments.speaker: S2
